title: Environ Engr Laboratory
description: Theory and application of environmental laboratory methods for measurement of fundamental properties and characteristics of dissolved and particulate constituents in water, air and soil systems.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CEE 2300 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (BIOL 1510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 1511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or (BIOS 1107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1107L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D))
